titleStmt.title: A true report and exact description of a mighty sea-monster or whale, cast vpon Langar-shore ouer against Harwich in Essex, this present moneth of Februarie 1617. With a briefe touch of some other strange precedent and present occurents.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Holland and are to be sold by C. [Holland] at the Globe in Cornehill ouer against the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: With woodcut title vignette; repeated on recto of B4, final leaf.
Identified as STC 20892a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Globe in Cornehill ouer against the Exchange
